--- Generated by EmmyLua(https://github.com/EmmyLua)
--- Created by liuyubao.
--- DateTime: 2021/12/24 10:52
---判断技能 是不是因为控制 而导致不能释放
---@class bt_con_astrict:ICondition
local bt_con_astrict = SimpleClassUtil:class(ICondition)

function bt_con_astrict:initData(data)
    self._skillTag = data.skillTag
    self._isDefy =  data.isDefy
end
---@param blackBoard BlackBoard_BattleBase
---@param battleManager PVE_Config_Battle_Manager
function bt_con_astrict:doCondition(blackBoard,battleManager)
    local _isUnPutSkill = blackBoard._isSilent
            or blackBoard._isSwimmy
            or blackBoard._isExiled
            or blackBoard._isBeatBack
            or blackBoard._nothingToSkill
    if not _isUnPutSkill or self._isDefy then
        return Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
    else
        return Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    end
end


return bt_con_astrict
